abstract: Having gastric bypass surgery has a halo effect that causes family members to lose weight, eat better and exercise more, a new study shows.
snippet: Having gastric bypass surgery has a halo effect that causes family members to lose weight, eat better and exercise more, a new study shows.
lead_paragraph: Having gastric bypass surgery has a ripple effect that causes family members to lose weight, eat better and exercise more, a new study shows.

headline.main: Weight Loss Surgery Benefits Entire Family
